metadata.title: CVE-2022-21653 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Jawn is an open source JSON parser. Extenders of the`org.typelevel.jawn.SimpleFacade` and `org.typelevel.jawn.MutableFacade`who don't override `objectContext()` are vulnerable to a hash collisionattack which may result in a denial of service. Most applications do notimplement these traits directly, but inherit from a library.`jawn-parser-1.3.1` fixes this issue and users are advised to upgrade. Forusers unable to upgrade override `objectContext()` to use a collision-safecollection.

criterions.comment: jawn package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
